About me

I work in consulting and studied computer engineering & business. I'm most excited by problems that are of society or economic design. Currently learning a lot about crypto, payments and agriculture. Trying to figure out what my role is in making the world a better place.

Highlights
  • Developed a data ecosystem design for leading market infrastructure company
  • Conducted due dilligence on 5 targets including 3 fintech companies
  • Co-produced a crypto market report for distriubtion to top international banking clients
  • Create a SQL data mapping for entire consumer banking analytics team at large canadian bank
  • Conducted entity resolution in Python to cross reference internal client data with vendor data and identify clients in which we could expand our payment products
  • Managed data flow, design, and implementation of senitment analysis of dashboard in PowerBI for senior leadership to track sales progress in payments sales team
